SELECT_FILE_FORMAT_CSV_DATA.message: Download Dates of Birth as a CSV File.
SELECT_FILE_FORMAT_CSV_DATA.description: Label for the dates of birth CSV file type

SELECT_CSV_DATA_DESCRIPTION.message:
Create and download a CSV file containing your friends' dates of birth.

This CSV file format can be used with Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets.

DO NOT USE it to import birthdays into a calendar; the ICS format is recommended instead.
SELECT_CSV_DATA_DESCRIPTION.description: Description for the CSV data file type
